concept_definition: to a greater extent or degree; in addition; further; additional amount (e.g., "more quickly", "want more", "no more").
to the greatest extent or degree; the majority of (e.g., "most important", "most people").
and no one or nothing more besides; solely; just; exclusively (e.g., "only you", "only trying to help").
used to emphasize something surprising or extreme; still; yet (e.g., "even better", "even now", "not even").
to a higher degree than is desirable or appropriate; also; in addition (e.g., "too hot", "me too").
to a great extent or degree; greatly; often (e.g., "much better", "not much", "thank you very much").
